name: Blaster_Support.Energy_Manipulation
display_help: Energy Manipulation allows you to channel energy to deliver deadly blows. These powers also help you focus your power to increase your own abilities.

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Energy_Manipulation.Power_Thrust
powers.display_help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends them flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 6.60% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.5s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Energy_Manipulation.Energy_Punch
powers.display_help: Powerful focused punch that may Disorient your opponent! Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 30.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 5.96s on target
30.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target
5.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.33s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Energy_Manipulation.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 100.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Energy_Manipulation.Bone_Smasher
powers.display_help: The Bone Smasher is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a good amount of damage. Has a greater chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 9.54s on target
60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 2s on target
9.90% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Energy_Manipulation.Conserve_Power
powers.display_help: You can channel a tremendous amount of energy through your body for a short period of time. Doing so will heal some hit points, reduce the endurance cost of your powers and boost your regeneration dramatically for a short time. Recharge: Long

display_info: 119.20% strength to Endurance Cost for 1m 0s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Energy_Manipulation.Stun
powers.display_help: Stun deals a little bit of damage, but Disorients its target a great deal. This attack can Disorient most opponents. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 11.90% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.3s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Energy_Manipulation.Power_Boost
powers.display_help: Greatly boosts the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Boost last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 78.67% strength to healing, ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique, defense, absorption, endurance, to hit, run speed, fly speed, confuse, terrorize, hold, immobilize, stun, sleep for 15s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Energy_Manipulation.Boost_Range
powers.display_help: You can boost your powers to increase the range of your next few attacks. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 59.60% strength to range for 30s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Energy_Manipulation.Total_Focus
powers.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 21.80% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10.8s on self
